pros: Master of Damage over Time debuffs
cons: Short-ranged mobbing attack with Paralyze
Slow playstyle that requires preparation & setup to deal damage
Teleport Mastery will trigger Damage Reflect
Need to remember to toggle Magic Guard

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +30%] [ +5% when wand is equipped]
Damage: [ +50%] [ up to +40%]
Final Damage: [ +40%] [ +5% per stack up to +25%] [ +20% to damage over time, stun, freeze, darkness, paralysis]

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Magician, intelligent and magical' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Magician, talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'Path of Fire and Poison'. Completing the quest will make you a Wizard (Fire, Poison) and you will be on the path to an Arch Mage (Fire, Poison). Wizard (Fire, Poison) is the 2nd job of Arch Mage (Fire, Poison)

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Paralyze - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Mist Eruption - Reinforce, Guardbreaker, and Cooldown Cutter

extraContent.title: DoT Debuffs
extraContent.content:
Stacking DoT debuffs will increase the %Final Damage of Mist Eruption against an enemy. Below is a list of skills that apply DoT effects:

  • Poison Breath (2nd Job)
  • Ignite (2nd Job)
  • Poison Mist (3rd Job)
  • Viral Slime (3rd Job)
  • Teleport Mastery (3rd Job)
  • Paralyze (4th Job)
  • Flame Haze (4th Job)
  • Ifrit (4th Job)
  • Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)
  • DoT Punisher (5th Job)
  • Poison Nova (5th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 309%, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: [Note]: Always remember to keep this toggled on

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 170, and up and down with 275
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +100

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Flame Orb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 301%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Casts a fireball forward

primary.name: Elemental Drain
primary.shortDesc: For each Damage-Over-Time effect active on nearby foes (up to 5): Final Damage: +3%.

primary.name: Poison Breath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 17, Damage: 180%, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage Over Time: 60% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec
primary.desc: Casts an orb forward that applies a damaging poison debuff

primary.name: Meditation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Party Member Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Magic Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Weapon's Attack Speed increased for 240 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Ignite
primary.shortDesc: When casting Fire magic, 50% chance to create a wall of fire that attacks at a certain interval with the following effects - [Max Enemies Hit: 8. Damage: 40%, Attack Count: 3, Duration: 6]
primary.desc: While toggled, there is a chance to create a wall of fire when a Fire-Attribute attacks damages an enemy
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Enemies that touch the wall receive a damaging burn debuff

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of the enemy's Max MP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Does not apply to bosses

primary.name: Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Casts an explosion around yourself

primary.name: Poison Mist
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Damage: 270%, Duration: 15 sec, Damage Over Time: 240% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Releases a lingering poisonous fog that applies a damaging poison debuff

primary.name: Viral Slime
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, 160% continuous damage to the target for 10 sec. Slime will last up to 60 sec and it will split up to 10 slimes\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Summons a slime that seeks and attacks enemies
details: If the slime defeats an enemy, it will split into 2

primary.name: Elemental Adaptation (Fire, Poison)
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, upon defending critical Abnormal Status, consumes up to 2% of Max MP and regenerate the barrier up to 5 times at 80% chance.\nCooldown: 240 sec\n[Passive Effect: Increases Abnormal Status and all Elemental Resistances by 20%]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Abnormal Status effect
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Once an Abnormal Status is blocked, there is a chance for the barrier to regenerate up to 5 times

primary.name: Elemental Decrease
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Elemental Attribute Resistance: -10%, Duration: 240 sec\n[Passive : Final damage +40%]

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Additional MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 272%, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4. For 4 sec, 98% damage at every 2 sec.\nPermanently increases Teleport distance by 20
primary.desc: When toggled, using will damage nearby enemies
details: Has a chance to stun enemies and apply a damaging burn debuff
Permanently increases the teleport distance

primary.name: Mana Burn
primary.shortDesc: Fire magic attacks burn 1% of the enemy's current MP, at 10% chance, and restore your MP by a set percentage of consumed MP.\nIf MP is burned, you can recover at least 100, but cannot recover more than 3000.\nIf the enemy's MP is under 20%, activation is restricted.
primary.desc: When using Fire-Attribute attacks magic, your attack has a chance to reduce an enemy's MP and restore your MP
details: Does not work if the enemy's MP is below 20%

primary.name: Element Amplification
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: +50%, Damage: +50%

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +13%

primary.name: Burning Magic
primary.shortDesc: Increases damage over time durations by 100%, increases final damage by 20% when attacking enemies affected by damage over time, stun, freeze, darkness, or paralysis effects.

primary.name: Paralyze
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 220%, Attack Count: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Paralysis Duration: 5 sec, Damage Over Time: 240% damage every 1 sec
primary.desc: Casts a wall of flame in front of you that applies paralysis and a damaging burn debuff

primary.name: Mist Eruption
primary.shortDesc: [Active Effects] MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Explosions: 2, Ignored Enemy Defense: +40%. Final Damage Modifier: +20% for 2 explosions, +45% for 3 explosions, +80% for 4 explosions, +125% for 5 explosions. Max Simultaneous Mist Explosions: 6. Cooldown: 10 sec\nMist Eruption's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds upon striking an enemy with 5 or more explosions. This cooldown reduction applies before other cooldown reductions.\n[Passive Effect] Permanently increases Poison Mist's continuous damage to 300%.
primary.desc: Causes nearby to explode damaging nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of
Damage of the explosion is increased based on how many DoT debuffs an enemy has active
Explosion has increased %Ignore DEF
If the explosion hits an enemy, the cooldown of Flame Haze is reset

Not affected by cooldown resets
  • Cooldown is slightly reduced if an enemy is hit by 5 or more explosions

primary.name: Fervent Drain
primary.shortDesc: Increases the Final Damage of each damage-over-time effect inflicted by your skills by 5%
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack

primary.name: Meteor Shower
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 12, Cooldown: 45 sec\nPassive Effect: [Final Attack] While on cooldown, your attack skills have a 60% chance to strike a single enemy with a meteorite, dealing 220% damage.
primary.desc: Creates a shower of meteors that rain down from the sky
details: [Final Attack]: While Meteor Shower is on cooldown, there is a chance your attacks cause for a meteor to strike a single enemy

primary.name: Flame Haze
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Damage on a Single Target: 202%, Number of Attacks: 15, inflicts 200% continuous damage at 100% chance for 10 sec. Maintains untouchable status and slows enemy by -50%. Upon hitting enemy, the Poison Mist forms on enemy location. If no enemy is hit, the Poison Mist forms on your location\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Launches a fireball forward at a single enemy that applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Enemies with the debuff are slowed and cannot deal touch damage
will form where an enemy was hit or around you if no enemy are struck

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Increases final damage of Magic ATT by 70%.
Periodically recovers base HP and MP by 10% and increases final damage of Magic ATT by 3%.
Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Knockback Resistance: +70%, Duration: 40 sec, Cooldown: 3 min
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Knockback Resistance and %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Ifrit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Duration: 260 sec, Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 3. Duration: 2 sec. Causes damage every 1 sec. for 140% damage. Permanently increases mastery by 70%
primary.desc: Summons a fire golem that attacks nearby enemies that applies a damaging burn debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Increases %Weapon Mastery

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Aside from minions' attacks, damage will increase by 8% for 5 sec at a 80% chance when the attack hits. Accumulates up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Damaging an enemy has a chance to grant a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently Increased Magic ATT: +30, Buff Duration: +50%

hyperPassive.name: Poison Mist - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of initial attack

hyperPassive.name: Poison Mist - Cripple
details: Increases %Damage of damage over time

hyperPassive.name: Paralyze - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of initial attack

hyperPassive.name: Paralyze - Cripple
details: Increases %Damage of damage over time

hyperActive.name: Inferno Aura
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100 per second, Damage per 3 second(s): 400%, Number of Attacks: 2.
hyperActive.desc: When toggled, creates an aura that damages nearby enemies
details: Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Megiddo Flame
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 420%, Number of Attacks: 15, 700% damage every 1 sec for 30 sec. Negates Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects.\nCooldown: 50 sec
hyperActive.desc: Launches a fireball that damages a single enemy and applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: DoT Punisher
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Flame Orbs Created: 15, Damage Per Orb: 775%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: 20 sec
Flame Orb Damage: 275% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec
Summons 1 additional orb for every 1 of your damage over time stack(s) on enemies in range. Up to 25 Flame Orbs can be summoned in total.
When multiple orbs hit a single target, their damage is reduced by 35%, starting with the second orb.
Cooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases multiple flame orbs that seek out enemies and applies a damaging burning debuff
details:
Summons additional orbs for every DoT debuff on enemies in range
  • Only up to a maximum of 25 Flame Orbs will be created
If multiple orbs hit a single target, their %Final Damage is reduced

fifthMain.name: Poison Nova
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Creates a number of poisonous clouds that deal 500% damage 12 times, and inflict an additional 600% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec. Enemies can only be struck by one poisonous cloud.\n2 sec or more after poisonous clouds are created, you can use Mist Eruption to detonate them, hitting up to 12 enemies dealing 450% damage 12 times. Explosion damage from poisonous clouds may stack, but if more than 3 are applied to a single enemy, the Final Damage for the additional explosions is decreased by 50%.\nCooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases multiple poison orbs that spread out in all directions, poisoning any enemies it collides with
details:
After several seconds, you can detonate the orbs to explode with dealing massive damage
  • The orbs will change colors when they are ready to detonate
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Elemental Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 6, Attack Duration: 3 sec\nDuration increases 0.6 sec per 1 active Fervent Drain\nCooldown: 75 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a spirit of fire to attack nearby enemies
details: Duration is increased for each stack of
Can only be used when is active
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Poison Chain
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 4, Poison Duration: 20 sec. Explosion from poisoned enemy attacks 5 times with 300% damage periodically, and spreads to 2 enemies nearby that aren't poisoned.
Poison accumulates up to 5 times. Explosion damage increases 55%p each in proportion to the accumulated poison.
Explosion can occur up to 9 times on 1 enemy and up to 22 times on all enemies in total.
If it ended because the available explosions were used up, every poison is removed and there is an additional explosion.
Cooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Casts a stacking poisonous debuff onto a single enemy that spreads to nearby enemies
details:
Debuffed enemies will periodically create a poisonous explosion that spreads the debuff
  • Debuff can stack up to 5 times, each time increases the %Damage of the poison explosion

Each enemy can only explode up to 9 times, and a total of 22 times across all affected enemies
  • If you reach maximum explosions, when the skill ends, all enemies will explode for a final explosion
Does not trigger Damage Reflect or

meta: Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) is an INT mage class part of the Explorers class group. They specialize in Damage over Time magic and dealing heavy damage with massive attacks
